name: rhachet
author: ehmpathy
description: A framework for reliable, thorough thought. Weave threads of thought via stitches.

scripts.fix: npm run fix:format && npm run fix:lint
scripts.build:compile: npm run build:compile:tsc && npm run build:compile:bun
scripts.build:compile:bun: npm run build:compile:bun:check:before && npm run build:compile:bun:run && npm run build:compile:bun:roles && npm run build:compile:bun:check:after
scripts.build:compile:bun:check:before: echo 'ðŸ” bun check...' && BUN_VERSION=$(bun --version) && [ -n "$BUN_VERSION" ] && echo "ðŸ‘Œ bun installed: $BUN_VERSION" || (echo 'â›ˆï¸ bun not functional' && exit 1)
scripts.build:compile:bun:check:after: test -f ./bin/run.bun.rhachet-run.bc && test -f ./bin/run.bun.rhachet-roles.bc && echo 'ðŸ‘Œ .bc files created' || (echo 'â›ˆï¸ .bc files not found' && ls -la ./bin/ && exit 1)
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:compile && npm run build:complete --if-present
scripts.test:commits: LAST_TAG=$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0 @^ 2> /dev/null || git rev-list --max-parents=0 HEAD) && npx commitlint --from $LAST_TAG --to HEAD --verbose
scripts.test:lint: npm run test:lint:biome && npm run test:lint:deps
scripts.test: npm run test:commits && npm run test:types && npm run test:format && npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:acceptance:locally
scripts.prepush: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.prepare: if [ -e .git ] && [ -z $CI ]; then npm run prepare:husky && npm run prepare:rhachet; fi
scripts.prepare:rhachet: rhachet init && rhachet roles link --repo ehmpathy --role mechanic && rhachet roles link --repo bhuild --role behaver && rhachet roles link --repo bhrain --role reviewer && rhachet roles init --role mechanic && rhachet roles init --role behaver
